openGraph.title: Red Sea Tattoo - Manchester's Premier Tattoo Studio

headline: Manchester's Most
Trusted Tattoo Studio
hero.subheadline: Right in the heart of Oxford Road, we've been Manchester's go-to spot for bold, clean tattoos that stand the test of time.

portfolio.subtitle: Fresh ink from the Red Sea studio

sessions.subtitle: From quick flash pieces to detailed custom work
sessions.guarantee: All sessions include aftercare kit and touch-up guarantee

testimonials.quote: Been going to Red Sea for years now, Marcus always delivers exactly what I want. The location on Oxford Road makes it so easy to get to.
testimonials.author: Jake M.

testimonials.quote: Really clean work and fair prices. Got a small piece done as a walk-in and the whole experience was spot on.
testimonials.author: Emma K.

testimonials.quote: The studio has such a good vibe and Marcus made me feel comfortable throughout my first tattoo. Couldn't be happier with how it turned out.
testimonials.author: Ryan P.

paragraphs: Started in a tiny shop just off Oxford Road back in 2018, Red Sea Tattoo has grown into one of Manchester's most reliable tattoo destinations. We're not the flashiest studio in town, but we're definitely one of the most consistent. Our approach is simple: listen to what you want, create something that works with your body, and execute it with clean, solid technique.

Marcus brings over a decade of tattooing experience to every piece, whether it's a quick flash design or a full custom sleeve. The studio sits right in the buzz of the city center, making us easily accessible whether you're a local or just visiting Manchester. We pride ourselves on being the kind of place where you can walk in nervous and leave feeling confident about your new ink.
about.callout: Every tattoo comes with our signature aftercare kit and a guarantee on our work.
about.imageAlt: Marcus tattooing at Red Sea Tattoo studio

items.question: Do you take walk-ins?
items.answer: Yeah, we do walk-ins most days for smaller pieces and flash work. For anything custom or larger, it's better to book ahead though. Give us a ring to check what slots we've got available.

items.question: What's your minimum charge?
items.answer: Our shop minimum is £80, which covers small pieces that take up to an hour. That includes all the setup, aftercare kit, and our time. Most flash pieces fall into this category.

items.question: How do I book a custom tattoo?
items.answer: Best way is to call or message us with your idea and we'll set up a consultation. We usually need about 2 weeks lead time for custom work to get the design right. Deposit is £50 which comes off your final bill.

finalCta.headline: Ready for Your Next Tattoo?
finalCta.subheadline: Visit us on Oxford Road or give us a call to discuss your ideas

booking.modalDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your booking request. We'll be in touch within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss any design details.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
